overview:
Jonathan has over twenty years experience with developing enterprise and commercial software as a developer, architect and project leader. Since 1996, he has been the CEO of the software development firm Duration Inc., which specializes in building software products for the web and mobile devices. Through his leadership, Duration Inc. has played a founding role in the technology infrastructure of Klout.com and Onboard Informatics. In addition, Duration has successfully built software products for Microsoft, Singapore National Environment Agency, Singapore Tourism Board, and notably Sample Czar, a market research sample broker. Currently, Duration Inc has over 20 software developers in offices in New York and Singapore.

Previous to his founding Duration Inc., Jonathan was an application developer at JP Morgan, Chase Manhattan Bank, and Smith Barney, specializing in Emerging Markets fixed income analytics. In 2000, he was a Founding Partner at Instant Gravity LLC, which developed new media and financial services technologies for such clients as CSFB, Bank of America, & DLJ.

Mr. Chua has been a speaker and lecturer on wireless /mobile technologies and internet databases. He has his BS in Computer Science from Colgate University. In his free time, he tries to stay in shape by training for triathlons. Federated Sample - Austin Levin
